root.name: sin()
root.description: Calculates the sine of an angle. This function expects the values of the angle parameter to be provided in radians (values from 0 to 6.28) by default, but in degrees (values from 0 to 360) if angleMode() is called with DEGREES as its parameter. Values are returned in the range -1 to 1.

parameter.label: rad
parameter.description: float: an angle in either radians or degrees, depending on the current angle mode
